Check to ensure that it is connect to mobile data or wifi Restrictive firewall if you are connected via wi-Fi , it\'s possible that there is a firewall blocking access to th IGap server. try another network or mobile data i GAP Limitless Connection Create your very own world \n with iGap right now SECURITY The thing is, iGap promises you providing a secure connection with your friends and family. We use all new encryption algorithms to secure your privacy. CHAT You can chat in private or groups and even create your own channel and add members. FILE TRANSFER You can transfer any file with any extension \n and size, Share anything you’d like to with whoever you want to. START NOW EVERYTHING FOR FREE! - - Not to bore you no more!
iGap is all Free. Create your own world just now! //profile user YOUR INFORMATION Enter your name and add a profile picture.
